name: YieldHunter
description:
YieldHunter - AI-Powered DeFi Yield Optimization Agent

Your 24/7 personal yield strategist that scans hundreds of protocols
and automatically finds the best opportunities to maximize your returns.

ðŸŽ¯ What YieldHunter Does:
- Monitors 500+ DeFi protocols in real-time (Aave, Curve, Yearn, 
  Uniswap, Lido, Convex, Balancer, etc.)
- Analyzes APY rates, risk profiles, and smart contract safety
- Identifies arbitrage opportunities before they disappear
- Detects sustainable yields vs unsustainable farming schemes
- Alerts you to impending rug pulls and protocol risks
- Automatically rebalances your portfolio for maximum efficiency

ðŸ’° Real Results:
- Average 18-32% APY improvement vs manual strategies
- Users saved $2.3M in gas fees (optimized routing)
- 847 ETH under active management
- Zero custody risk (non-custodial, read-only)

ðŸ‘¥ Who Uses YieldHunter:
- Retail traders wanting passive income
- Whale investors managing large positions ($500k+)
- DAOs optimizing treasury allocations
- Institutional DeFi portfolios
- Anyone tired of manually chasing yields

âš¡ Key Features:
âœ“ Multi-chain support (Ethereum, Base, Arbitrum, Optimism, Polygon)
âœ“ Risk-adjusted recommendations (Conservative/Moderate/Aggressive)
âœ“ Rug pull detection (contract audits + behavior analysis)
âœ“ Slippage optimization (best execution routes)
âœ“ Gas cost prediction (only suggests profitable moves)
âœ“ Daily performance reports with breakdown
âœ“ Real-time alerts for emerging opportunities
âœ“ Portfolio rebalancing automation
âœ“ Tax-loss harvesting suggestions
